Label: Selected Input
Notes: Display channel name on the switches
Hover help text in the status bar: Input Channel Number and Selection.
Keyboard shortcuts: Type �I� to switch to the Input Tab. Prompt in the status bar for 5 seconds to type a number and then return to select the corresponding input channel.

Label: Input Name
Hover help text in the status bar: Displayed Input Channel Name (editable).

Label: Attenuation
Hover help text in the status bar: Input Channel Attenuation.

Label: Delay/Latency comp.
Notes: Highlight �Latency Compensation� for negative values or �Delay� for positive values
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Input Channel Delay (positive values) or Latency Compensation (negative values).

Label: Minimal Latency
Hover help text in the status bar: Select between Acoustic Precedence and Minimal Latency for Amplification Precedence.

Label: Position X
Default: distribute in the middle of the stage in up to 8 rows of 8
Notes: Incremented or decremented by horizontal axis of JoystickXY if no tracking enabled (locally and globally) Greyed out and uneditable when tracking enabled.
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position in Width. Nudge with Left and Right Arrow Keys.
Keyboard shortcuts: Left and Right Arrows to nudge to the left (--) or right (++) if inputTracking == 0 in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Y
Default: distribute in the middle of the stage in up to 8 rows of 8
Notes: Incremented or decremented by vertical axis of JoystickXY if no tracking enabled (locally and globally) Greyed out and uneditable when tracking enabled.
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position in Depth. Nudge with Up and Down Arrow Keys.
Keyboard shortcuts: Up and Down Arrows to nudge to the upstage (++) or downstage (--) if inputTracking == 0 in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Z
Default: distribute in the middle of the stage in up to 8 rows of 8
Notes: Incremented or decremented by V slider with return to zero if no tracking enabled (locally and globally) Greyed out and uneditable when tracking enabled.
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position in Height. Nudge with Page Up and Page Down Keys.
Keyboard shortcuts: Page Up and Page Down to nudge to the up (++) or down (--) if inputTracking == 0 in 0.1m increments

Label: Offset X
Notes: incremented or decremented by horizontal axis of JoystickXY if tracking enabled (locally and globally)
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position Offset in Width. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
Keyboard shortcuts: Left and Right Arrows to nudge to the left (--) or right (++) if inputTracking == 1 in 0.1m increments

Label: Offset Y
Notes: incremented or decremented by vertical axis of JoystickXY if tracking enabled (locally and globally)
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position Offset in Depth. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
Keyboard shortcuts: Up and Down Arrows to nudge to the upstage (++) or downstage (--) if inputTracking == 1 in 0.1m increments

Label: Offset Z
Notes: incremented or decremented by V slider with return to zero if tracking enabled (locally and globally)
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Object Position Offset in Height. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
Keyboard shortcuts: Page Up and Page Down to nudge to the up (++) or down (--) if inputTracking == 1 in 0.1m increments

Label: Constraint X
Notes: Limit positionX to the bounds of the stage in width
Hover help text in the status bar: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Width.

Label: Constraint Y
Notes: Limit positionY to the bounds of the stage in depth
Hover help text in the status bar: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Depth.

Label: Constraint Z
Notes: Limit positionZ to the bounds of the stage in height
Hover help text in the status bar: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Height.

Label: Flip X
Notes: In calculations positionX will be symetrical to the origin, keyboard nudging will be inverted
Hover help text in the status bar: X will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.

Label: Flip Y
Notes: In calculations positionY will be symetrical to the origin, keyboard nudging will be inverted
Hover help text in the status bar: Y will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.

Label: Flip Z
Notes: In calculations positionZ will be symetrical to the origin, keyboard nudging will be inverted
Hover help text in the status bar: Z will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.

Label: Joystick XY
Notes: Adjusts inputPositionX and inputPositionY when inputTracking == 0; inputOffsetX and inputOffsetY otherwise.
Hover help text in the status bar: Adjusts Positions X and Y (or Offset if Tracking is Enabled).

Label: Joystick Z
Notes: Adjusts inputPositionZ when inputTracking == 0; inputOffsetZ otherwise.
Hover help text in the status bar: Adjusts Position Z (or Offset if Tracking is Enabled).

Label: Cluster
enum: Single�; Cluster 1�; Cluster 2�; Cluster 3�; Cluster 4�; Cluster 5�; Cluster 6�; Cluster 7�; Cluster 8�; Cluster 9�; Cluster 10
Hover help text in the status bar: Object is Part of a Cluster. Use number keys to Quickly assign Cluster.
Keyboard shortcuts: Assign cluster number with number keys 1>1; 2>2; � ; 9>9; 0>10; last key after the numbers > removes the cluster

Label: Tracking Active
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Tracking for Object.

Label: Tracking ID
Notes: Greyed out but editable when trackingActive == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Tracker ID for Object.

Label: Tracking Smoothing
Notes: Greyed out but editable when trackingActive == 0

Label: Max Speed Active
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Speed Limiting for Object.

Label: Max Speed
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Maximum Speed Limit for Object.

Label: Height Factor
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Take Elevation of Object into Account Fully, Partially or Not.

Label: Attenuation Law
Hover help text in the status bar: Attenuation Law Model (Linear Decrease of Volume with Distance Between Object and Speaker or Squared).

Label: Distance Attenuation
Notes: visible if inputAttenuationLaw == 0 (shares the same position as Dial distanceRatio)
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Attenuation per Meter Between Object and Speaker.

Label: Distance Ratio
Notes: visible if inputAttenuationLaw == 1 (shares the same position as Dial distanceAttenuation)
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Attenuation Ratio for Squared Model.

Label: Common Attenuation
Hover help text in the status bar: Percentage of the Common Part of the Attenuation for selected Object Relative to All Outputs.

Label: Directivity
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: How Wide is the Brightness of The Object.

Label: Rotation
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Where is the Object pointing to in the Horizontal Plane.

Label: Tilt
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Where is the Object pointing to in the Vertical Plane.

Label: HF Shelf
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: How Much Brightness is lost in the Back of the Object, Out of its Brightness Cone.

Label: Active
Hover help text in the status bar: If You Need to Reduce the Level in Speakers Close to the Object. (eg. Loud Source Present on Stage)

Label: Radius
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: How Far does the Attenuation Affect The Speakers.

Label: Shape
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Profile of the Attenuation Around the Object. This Value is Fully Applied to Objects Sitting on Top of Speakers.

Label: Attenuation
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Constant Attenuation of Speakers Around the Object.

Label: Peak Threshold
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Fast Compression Threshold for Speakers Around the Object to Control Transients.

Label: Peak Ratio
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Ratio to Apply the the Fast Compression for Speakers Around the Object to Control Transients.

Label: Slow Threshold
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Slow Compression Threshold for Speakers Around the Object to Control Sustained Level.

Label: Slow Ratio
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputLSactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Ratio to Apply the the Slow Compression for Speakers Around the Object to Control Sustained Level.

Label: Floor Reflections � Active
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.

Label: Attenuation
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Attenuation of the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.

Label: Low Cut Active
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable the Low Cut Filter on the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.

Label: Low Cut Freq
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0 or inputFRlowCutActive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds

Label: High Shelf Active
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable the High Shelf Filter on the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.

Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0 or inputFRhighShelfActive == 0

Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0 or inputFRhighShelfActive == 0

Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0 or inputFRhighShelfActive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds

Label: Diffusion
Notes: Greyed out but editable when inputFRactive == 0
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Diffusion Effect of the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.

Label: Jitter
OSC path optional value: extra value is transition time in seconds
Hover help text in the status bar: Sphere of Rapid Movements of the Object.

Notes: Greyed out but editable when LFOactive == 0
